Name: EEG recordings for 200 object images presented in RSVP sequences at 5Hz or 20Hz
ReferenceAndLinks: Grootswagers, T., Robinson, A.K., Carlson, T.A., 2019. The representational dynamics of visual objects in rapid serial visual processing streams. NeuroImage, 188, 668-679. https://doi.org/10.1016/j.neuroimage.2018.12.046
